item.value: Indicates an element that has non-class/style dynamic props.
The compiler pre-compiles static string styles into static objects
detects and hoists inline static objects
Indicates an element with dynamic textContent (children fast path)
Check the `patchElement` function in './createRenderer.ts' to see how the
// Patch flags can be combined using the | bitwise operator and can be checked // using the & operator, e.g.
